group_1.textLeft: Welcome home~
Sorry, but could you grab@the newspaper off my desk?

group_1.textRight: ...Mother, something fell to the floor.@A letter...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, thank you. You see this?@It's an invitation to a class reunion.
Hmm, I'm torn.

group_1.textRight: I see... ...The person who wrote this@letter has very pretty handwriting.

group_1.textLeft: It is really pretty, isn't it? This is@from our former class president.
Eh?

group_1.textRight: That's how it sounded from the way you@were talking, but was I mistaken...?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Not at all, we actually@used to go out together.
Oh dear, you know even your mother@was a young lady once?
But keep this a secret from your father or he'll@be more jealous than a jar of jelly, okay?

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, did you love this person, Mother?

group_1.textLeft: Ehh―?!@Love...I'm not sure...
Of course I love him.

group_1.textRight: ...But you're unsure of your previous lover?

group_1.textLeft: ...Mmm~@That's a really complicated question.

group_1.textRight: So love is, as I thought, just a mood?

group_1.textLeft: A mood... I don't think that's@quite the right word for it.
It was so long ago, and we were both young...
Whether it was a crush, or true love...@Or maybe something else entirely...
After all this time I just don't know. But I@do know that I cherished it back then.
Well, I'm married to your father, so if something@were to go on now there'd be big trouble. *Giggle*
Whether it's love, romance, or anything of the sort.
Wherever they are, I can only hope they're@living a happy and healthy life.
Now I love your father, and you, Masara.
But...I think it's because of@the time I spent with them
that I was able to meet your father and then you,@and I'm all the more happy now.
Hmm... That's hard to explain...
Everything has lead up to the present...@I suppose...
That's right! There's something@I can show you regarding that...
Oh dear, do we have a guest?

group_1.textRight: ...I'll go do a little shopping, then.
You can finish when I get back.

group_1.textLeft: Eh, ah, wait, Masara...!
